original_text: But if it is preached that Christ has been raised from the dead, how can some of you say that there is no resurrection of the dead?
korean_text: 그리스도께서 죽은 자 가운데서 다시 살아나셨다 전파되었거늘 너희 중에서 어떤 사람들은 어찌하여 죽은 자 가운데서 부활이 없다 하느냐

sentences.original_text: that Christ has been raised from the dead
how can some of you say
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람들이 어떻게 말할 수 있느냐

sentences.original_text: that there is no resurrection of the dead?
